intro.headline: Let's work together
intro.description: I am a Front-end developer based in Duesseldorf, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member for your team.
intro.contactText: If you think I´d be a good match for your projects, contact me.

comments.headline: Need a team player?
comments.subHeadline: Here is what my colleagues said about me

feedback.name: Peter Pfautsch
feedback.text: Benjamin, your structured approach and quick problem-solving were key to the project's success. Thank you for your reliable and precise work!

feedback.name: Dennis Freyer
feedback.text: He is very helpful and always has a solution ready when problems arise.

projects.headline: My Work
projects.subHeadline: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

projects.title: JOIN
projects.subtitle: JavaScript | HTML | CSS | Firebase
projects.description: Task manager, inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

projects.title: El Pollo Loco
projects.subtitle: JavaScript | HTML | CSS
projects.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

projects.title: Pokédex
projects.subtitle: JavaScript | HTML | CSS | API
projects.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.description: Please use the contact form to reach me. I look forward to hearing from you and am sure we can bring your ideas to life together :)
contact.name: Your name
contact.privacy: I have read the Privacy Policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.
contact.emailError: Enter a valid email address (must contain a '@', for example: example@aol.com
contact.messageError: The message field cannot be empty and must contain at least 3 letters.

legal.heading: Legal Notice
legal.responsibility: Responsible for the content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
legal.liability_content_text: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages according to § 7 Abs.1 TMG and the general laws. However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored foreign information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activities. Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which I become aware of a concrete legal violation. If I become aware of corresponding legal violations, I will immediately remove this content.
legal.liability_links_text: My offer contains links to external websites of third parties, over whose content I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for these foreign contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of the link. Illegal content was not detectable at the time the link was created. However, permanent monitoring of the linked pages without concrete evidence of a legal violation is unreasonable. If I become aware of legal violations, I will immediately remove such links.
legal.copyright_text: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The duplication, editing, distribution, and any kind of use beyond the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. As far as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. If you become aware of a copyright violation, we ask you to inform us. If legal violations become known, I will immediately remove such content.
legal.dispute_text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
legal.dispute_info: I am neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer dispute resolution body.
